product_name: DIMEDewy Day Cream with Rosehip + Tremella
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackDIME Dewy Day Cream: Rosehip + Tremella helps to infuse your skin with multi-layered, lightweight moisture. A powerful blend of antioxidant ingredients in this cream helps to ensure that the skin remains hydrated and balanced to prevent and reduce signs of aging. The perfect way to start any day!
details: DetailsBenefitsHelps to replenish skinAssists with plumping and firming the skinHelps reduce the signs of agingEWG VERIFIEDKey IngredientsRosehip Seed Oil (Rosa Canina): Rosehip oil is full of vitamins, antioxidants, and essential fatty acids that are all valued for their ability to nourish the skin. Scientific studies show rosehip oil can reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and dark spots.Snow Mushroom (Tremella Fuciformis Extract): Snow Mushroom is a dynamite hydrator as it can hold up to 500 times its own weight in water and the particles of this extract are smaller than most extracts allowing it to easily penetrate the skin.Ceramide 3: Ceramides are used to replenish the natural lipids that are lost from exposure to harsh environmental factors, the use of drying products, and the aging process. They help to restore moisture, reinforce the skin's natural barrier and help protect it against harm from foreign elements.Item 2612541How To UseApply in the morning time after cleansing your face with the DIME Gentle Jelly Cleanser. For best results, apply every day.As a Conscious Beauty brand, DIME features sustainable packaging. Once product is empty, rinse jar and toss into recycling bin.IngredientsWater, Ethylhexyl Olivate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Isononyl Isononanoate, Pentylene Glycol, Glyceryl Stearate, 1,2 Hexanediol, Squalane, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Unsaponifiables, Xanthan Gum, Behenyl Alcohol, Carbomer, Rosa Moschata Seed Oil, Linoleic Acid, Phospholipids, Phytosterols, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Betaine, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Ceramide NP, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycolipids, Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp Extract, Soybean Phytosterols, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply in the morning time after cleansing your face with the DIME Gentle Jelly Cleanser. For best results, apply every day.As a Conscious Beauty brand, DIME features sustainable packaging. Once product is empty, rinse jar and toss into recycling bin.

reviews.headline: Overpriced. Not worth it.
reviews.comments: This day cream feels lovely but is extremely overpriced. It feels exactly like Cerave moisturizing cream.

reviews.headline: Very waxy feeling
reviews.comments: The cream wouldn't soak into my skin. It's very thick and waxy feeling. Perhaps I got an old product because it felt terrible on my skin like it would clog pores and it had a funky scent.

reviews.headline: Super thick and heavy texture
reviews.comments: I have dry and dehydrated skin. The cream doesn't easily absorb into the skin at all, and it sits on the face hot and heavy. Really struggling to finish it. My husband is usually not picky, but he too doesn't like it at all.

reviews.headline: Dime is the best!
reviews.comments: I use the full Dime skincare line, and it's the best I've ever used. I'm 58 and needed a change about a year ago as I started to see changes in my skin. I also wanted to start using a clean product line. I found Dime, and it's been amazing. The Dewy Day cream is in fact dewy! I often start applying this and hear myself say outloud, "Ahhhh." It just feels so good going on and does it's job well. Perfect for daytime and under makeup.

reviews.headline: New Favorite Brand
reviews.comments:
I dislike fragrances and for some reason, it is difficult to find skincare without it.
This brand is my new go-to.  It is light, dewy, and does what i need it to do.  I also love the price.

reviews.headline: Overall satisfied
reviews.comments: I've used this moisturizer a few times. So far I'm liking it, it goes on smoothly and doesn't feel sticky.

reviews.headline: Extraordinarily Drying
reviews.comments: I love the sleek, black packaging. However, I do not understand all the good reviews.  I have extremely oily skin, and this "dewy" cream made my skin very dry and tight every time I used it. I very much prefer the dewy skin cream from Tatcha.

reviews.headline: Not hydrating
reviews.comments: Im almost done with it and can say that im disappointed it was not hydrating. I put a good amount too to make sure and nothing. I really liked the toner so i wanted to try the day cream but i honestly didnt like it. For the price you could spend the same or spend a little more and get a better product

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: I've tried many many moisturizers over the years ranging from $45-$200 and this one is my absolute favorite! It'll be the one i get from hear on out. Im 49 and in my llayer year have experienced dry skin. Which looks like old skin . But this moisturizer is so good my skin looks younger!

reviews.headline: Really am enjoying
reviews.comments: I recently had almost a chapped texture to my skin I'm not really sure why but this cream is so hydrating it took care of all the issues I was having. A little goes such a long way. I have pretty sensitive/combination skin.

reviews.headline: Blooming MOLD SPORES
reviews.comments:
Received a GWP sample from Ulta.

Opened to use and it has blooms of mold spores!

Yikes.

The product was never opened and never used. Promptly went into the trash

reviews.headline: Expensive Vaseline dupe
reviews.comments: I got this as a freevie and thank God it was a freebie. 0/10. If by dewy they mean greasy, then yes! I have normal-sometimes dry skin and I used it on a "dryer" day, it felt really gross and warm on my face. Very similar to vaseline. Thick and very difficult to wash hands after. Oil stains on my wash towel. I didn't have the red and blotchy allergic reactions like a lot of the other receiws, but this is glorified vaseline.

faceoff_positive.comments: Honestly this cream is the best!!! Does not leave oily or tacky texture at all!!!! Goes on smoothly and absorbs quickly so you have to work fast but when it dries, man i tell ya i love the texture on my skin. Smooth. A little goes a long way with this one. I also use 4 other products from dime. I can't definitely see results in two weeks! My skin has a glow to it, my husband noticed it when we video chat and he says "are you using a filter? You're so glowy!" Of course i said no lol that's when it clicked that dime products actually works!!! Will continue using dime. I love dime products!!! See photo for before and after pictures.
faceoff_positive.headline: MY FAVORITE DAY CREAM!!

faceoff_negative.comments: The product is great if you can tolerate working with this company. Literally my last 3 orders have all had issues. It didn't used to be this way so not sure what's changed.   The first two orders they kept sending me the same "wrong" product - the Hyper Glow instead of the Hyaluronic Serum (perhaps change the packaging so the employees don't keep grabbing the wrong one?) Because they won't mail you the right one until you've gone out of your way to send them back the wrong product they sent to you.   My last order was made Oct 5 and showed "label made post office waiting for package" for 7 days! I finally emailed them on the 12th to ask what gives?! They just sat on it for a full week and likely would have never of sent it if I didn't contact them. The same day I contacted them it shipped (on my door step two days later.)   The problem is, it's always something these days, which makes it too hard to do business with them. I'm too busy to be fixing their errors and making sure they're doing their job.
faceoff_negative.headline: Product good; Service bad

rollup.name: Dewy Day Cream with Rosehip + Tremella
